results.content: The authentication system on this app is some of the best I've ever seen. NestJS is also an amazing framework. I would not recommend this course for beginners because there are some advanced topics like dependency injection in Nest. Make sure you have good knowledge of Typescript too before starting. I bought this course, but spent a little over a month learning about OOP design patterns before working through the Nest part. The frontend ties everything together nicely. For redux I prefer to use hooks instead of the HOC used in the course. Other than that this course is excellent!

For redux I prefer to use hooks instead of the HOC used in the course. Other than that this course is excellent!

results.content: Conteúdo e explicações excelentes. Professor antencioso, responde bem rápido.
results.content_html: Conteúdo e explicações excelentes. Professor antencioso, responde bem rápido.

results.content: Nice job. Lots of practical stuff. Pretty light on theory but that is to be expected. Clear and concise; definitely for more advanced devs.
results.content_html: Nice job. Lots of practical stuff. Pretty light on theory but that is to be expected. Clear and concise; definitely for more advanced devs.

results.content:
It was a nice little dive into the Nest World. 
In some lessons, placeholders were not removed or JS/ TSX best practices weren't followed. But it was good for NestJs beginners to get going and understand how the Backend works.

I didnt need the React part of the course, because i am already familiar with the Frontend part of it. 

It was a fast and well thought course, i recommend it - because it doesnt waste your time.
results.content_html:
It was a nice little dive into the Nest World.
In some lessons, placeholders were not removed or JS/ TSX best practices weren't followed. But it was good for NestJs beginners to get going and understand how the Backend works.

I didnt need the React part of the course, because i am already familiar with the Frontend part of it.

It was a fast and well thought course, i recommend it - because it doesnt waste your time.

results.content: Buenas Antonio me hubiera gustado darte las 5 estrellas, pero me falto en NestJs relacionar productos en ordenes y mucho mas en la parte de ReactJs complementar la creación de ordenes, ordenes en PDF y en los mensajes como utilizar un Sweet Alert. Pero muchas gracias por el aporte me sirvió mucho en la parte de NestJS.
